website_summaries.verdict: A great theft deterrent, this chock lock works best with smaller vehicles like ATVs and trailers with rims around 10 inches.
pros: Built-in chock prevents towing, rollaway, or driving
Epoxy powder coat finish for durability and rust prevention
cons: Rust and debris can ruin the keyhole
Thieves can still drive with chock lock on, although they won't get away quickly or quietly
If the red portion of the lock is on the tire, it is not secure

customer_reviews.title: More of a visual deterrent
customer_reviews.text: I found out it's more of a visual deterrent, as many others I see did the same I drove off with it on my utility trailer. After about 20 feet I went back and it had bent it enough I just reached down and pulled it off still locked. It didn't hurt my trailer or tire thank goodness but it proved pretty quick even if installed correctly (as it was) it wouldn't slow down someone from stealing the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Would not unlock
customer_reviews.text: After about a year the lock mechanism would not unlock. I tried everything removing pressure, wiggling, lubrication, and fought for a half hour with no luck. I then grabbed a reciprocating saw(with a dull blade) and cut through the arm in 10 seconds. Made me realize how ineffective of a lock was the whole time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E. Belyew

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but don't forget to take it off before ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but don't forget to take it off before you start to drive! It will damage the vehicle. (Yes, I am a dummy. lol)
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on my trailers 225/75/15 tires
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my trailers 225/75/15 tires. I have a tandem axle trailer and I use two , one on each axle. The wheel chock also helps keep the trailer from moving while jacking up and disconnecting. I got these as a deterrent from thieves and 90% of thieves will not bother when they see this on there especially with two as it would be very time consuming to remove both. I also use locking Lug nuts on the rims and two coupler locks which makes a great trifecta security solution.
customer_reviews.author: Chappie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good deterrent
customer_reviews.text: The Chock Lock itself seems fine. It would be hard to say how well it works unless the trailer was stolen from a malfunction. My only disappointment is that the key cannot be duplicated, so if we lose the master keys, we then are in a mess. So, how do we get additional keys? This is why I give it four stars. Also I cursed out the company as I tried to get in the plastic clamshell. Is this necessary? No information or directions were included that could have addressed the key issue.
customer_reviews.author: kaukaty

customer_reviews.title: They can drive off with this on the wheel!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this lock I was a bit skeptical that it could protect my trailer, and I was right. My trailer was stolen this morning with this on the wheel. The thief just drove it away with this thing clinking on the ground. For my next trailer I will just chain the wheels together.
customer_reviews.author: Bros

customer_reviews.title: The trailer was stolen within 1 week of installing this ...
customer_reviews.text: The trailer was stolen within 1 week of installing this device. Save your money, cheap product that doesn't do what they say it will do!
customer_reviews.author: morgan j smith

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: I am using this lock on a dual axle flatbed trailer. It fit my wheels OK and have had no problems locking or unlocking so far. Its yellow color makes it visible and may cause a potential thief to not bother and move on to an easier subject. I'm sure it won't stop a seriously dedicated thief though, with proper tools. I also use hitch lock as an additional deterrent. Multiple devices would definitely cause a thief to try somewhere else - unless you had an Lamborghini or Ferarri on the trailer and unguarded. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ParaboTECH

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews of how this didn't quite fit the tire. Well, this doesn't quite fit the tire. I think it would be a visual deterrent if anyone saw it while trying to steal my trailer. Fairly easy to install and remove. I found when installing if you lock it, then push it together it kind of ratchets together as you push the parts together. I would buy this again if I need morel
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: No lock is 100 % safe, but this is a damn good start to protect your trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Boy, I did save a lot on Amazon.com instead of buying it in Canada, even with our poor exchange rate. No rust on the product after my first season with it. Very easy to use. Some YouTube videos recommand this lock. Of course, a thief can stole the whole Wheel but all in all, it is longer and more dissuasive. Moreover, my trailer is not moving anymore while in the parking, thanks to the design of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben QC

customer_reviews.title: Fits cargo trailer tire, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bright yellow makes it easy to identify if a thief is looking to drive away with your trailer, we also use a coupler lock. If someone really wants your trailer they'll figure out a way to steal it but if you make it a little challenging, then they may go to another easier target. I also like that this can also be used as a wheel chock. Time will tell if it rusts. A plastic lock cover comes with it to keep water/snow out when you have it locked.
customer_reviews.author: @mLehua

customer_reviews.title: oops
customer_reviews.text: well, the first time I drove the van pulling my trailer equipped with one of these, I forgot to take it off, and it did allow the wheel to turn, however, it ripped out the stem and all the air in the tire escaped. pulled the tire, took it to a tire shop and they put the stem back in, aired it up, I came home, put it on the trailer and learned that this thing will slow down a theif
customer_reviews.author: Bob E Long, Pistol Instructor, Freedom Ranch Pistol Academy, Bristow, OK  ccw-ok

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: My wheel chock/lock was installed on my flatbed trailer when a drunk driver smashed into it. Obviously it didn't keep the trailer from moving when it went airborne, but it did dig into the concrete and limit how far the trailer traveled after impact. I'm very happy with the way it held up. The damage is limited to a slight bend in the actual chock and some scrapes on the rubberized coating
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: StAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for 3 different trailers. I live florida where it is humid and it rains a bit. in 5.5 months of use for my trailer sitting in parking lot, the key will no longer open the lock. All 3 that I have purchased are all useless. The lock will not open on any of them. I called TRIMAX and the guy I spoke to said I am sorry. so let's see, each unit is over $40.00 each. They last 5.5 months and then the lock fails? The company will not help you after the sale....why would I buy anything from them again?
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hodsdon

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel lock for a camper!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a TAG Teardrop Trailer by nuCamp and I wanted to get a wheel lock that would prevent it from being stolen whenever we're off on a hike or at the store. I did my research and this had great reviews across the web; plus, tons of nuCamp customers use this model. It's worked great so far, is easy to travel with, and gives me a piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Chwalik

customer_reviews.title: Great design and fits really well
customer_reviews.text: The device fits well and is well made. It also works as a chuck which is a great feature. It slides in easily and the locking mechanism works, but i feel it is a little flimsy. Sometimes you have to do it several times to lock it but i feel once it's locked it will be hard to pick or even hit because of where it is. This is a good deterrent or slow down if someone wants to take your rig. With 2 of these and it will make it harder and they serve the purpose of chucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Not just a visual warning
customer_reviews.text: Received the Tire Lock and it is packaged very well, maybe too well but overly packaged is better than the under! Item works smoothly and the lock works well unlike some locks that you have to fiddle with to get them to stay locked. Looks good on the trailer and hopefully will deter anyone from trying to borrow it without permission!
customer_reviews.author: tkdjim

customer_reviews.title: Why do I have the same key for both Trimax TCL65 Wheel Chock Lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 smaller TC65 wheel chock locks for our camper trailer. Since they didn't come in a pack, I would assume that I'd receive two different types of keys. Each set of keys opens both locks. Are the keys all the same for all the wheel chock locks? Can a thief have a chock lock key and simply unlock my wheel locks?
customer_reviews.author: clazarus

customer_reviews.title: Good visual deterrent
customer_reviews.text: It is more of a visual deterrent then a physical one. It would take about 10 seconds to cut it off with a battery powered bandsaw. But it will take having tools and making some noise to cut it off. I personally have 2 types of locks on the hitch to add to the difficulty of stealing my trailer. I would think would be thieves will seek an easier target.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, thick hard metal, works on SMALL trailer wheels/tires
customer_reviews.text: Locks only keep good people honest, if someone wants your stuff they will take it. That being said I bought this for my 5x8 trailer with TINY 12 inch wheels and it works perfectly. Heavy duty metal that can be broken into. If you got about 30 mins and you are stealing from a deaf person go for it. If you’re taking my trailer I’d be in your face before you even got a quarter the way through it. I WILL BUY ONE FOR EACH OF MY TRAILERS.
customer_reviews.author: JayFizzelFoShizzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Installation in less than 5 minutes. It’s my second purchase from Trimax and once again I’m pleased with the quality and durability. Fits on 15” utility trailer wheels with ease. Also includes a plastic cap that covers the key hole preventing rust over time from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Sue White

customer_reviews.title: Careful! Check your brakes...
customer_reviews.text: Good product..well constructed and quality material....however, it is not compatible with my campers electric brakes...recommend the product description include this restriction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $40 cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Seen this product on a trailer at a job site and needed one for my trailer. Went to the manufacturer website and seen it was $40 more then Amazon had it. Big plus This is heavy duty very pleased with product. Shipping was under 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Robert P West

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catching
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, Solid, Easy to use. but most of all Eye Catching. I drive a 1982 Toyota Pickup that has no security whatsoever. I used to use a brake lock and steering wheel lock but, no one would notice. I wanted something that would catch the would be thieves eyes and ward them off from a distance. This does exactly that. Now I feel more secure that would be thieves will not even bother breaking in just find a brake lock in place. Many have commented about how secure it looks and even more have asked where to get one. I Love It.
customer_reviews.author: Serikloo

customer_reviews.title: Easy Security
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the wheel chock lock offers an extra measure of security - both as a lock and chock. We have a small lightweight trailer and this is a great solution for both storage and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Crappy locks do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and when it came time to sell my trailer it would not unlock. I tried lubricating the lock letting it sit for a while. Came back and tried tapping it simultaneously while trying to unlock. Still wouldn't unlock. So got my grinder out with the diablo metal blade and cut one arm of in no time. Crappy locks do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with my small utility trailer wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. This was the only wheel lock That I can use on my small 12 inch trailer wheels. It doesnt lock into the rim however as my wheel spokes dont have a large enough openings. I also have a ball and hitch lock on the trailer so no easy theft regardless. (Trailer theft is common here.)
customer_reviews.author: JamesBlonde001

customer_reviews.title: Best chock lock ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome I was a little worried about the fit but this thing fits perfect. I travel with a 5 by 8 trailer and I let it sit at the hotel when I don't need it so this thing really takes the worry out of getting my trailer stolen just remember to buy some lock nuts too that way you caint just take the tire off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I have an open flatbed car trailer that I'll leave at a hotel when I need to take a car out of town. I had a trailer stolen one time about 3 years ago, even with a ball lock. I still use a ball lock, but also plant this bad boy on one of the trailer wheels. Being bright yellow, I'm sure it has caused some folks to just move on and not even think about it... too much hassle. This is powder coated, and a great rubber coating is on the ends to prevent scratching your wheels. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: used for a big move
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Oregon to Florida and I used this to secure my car being towed behind a 20 foot Uhaul so I could sleep at night. It was the smartest addition to our 7 day trip. Super easy to use and I was able to feel very secure at night in the hotels. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Cederberg

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but cheap lock cover
customer_reviews.text: purchased Nov 27, 2018 used it three times . today went to pop the yellow cover on the lock and the strap that holds it to the "finger" broke. Small thing i know but does make me wonder how cheap the lock is made now. thin plastic "band" could easily be a heavy rubber then it would not slip off and might last longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Wilstyx

customer_reviews.title: Your ad was misleading !
customer_reviews.text: It did NOT fit !! Your ad said it would fit all sizes !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, and great for a multilevel security approach.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy application and removal (with a key), high visibility, and serves well as an additional wheel chock. Pair this with a hitch lock to make thieves look for an easier target. Make sure your spare tire isn’t accessible so a wheel locked tire can’t be removed and replaced with an unlocked tire.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Chef

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today for an extra security on a trailer and it looks and fills great. And it was a good prices as well. I have it on a 21 ft travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Great Deterrent - Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to install on the wheel - but all in all it does what it should. More important - it is a great visual deterrent for theft. It looks like it would stop the wheel from moving - and it's easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tenerelli

customer_reviews.title: With its bright yellow color, its an "in your face" security tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and good materials at the right price. I have this installed on my toyhauler along with a Masterlock for the hitch. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostrider61

customer_reviews.title: Well-made And a good visual deterrent as well
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit disappointed by the fit on my wheel, it might be different for other brands of rims/tires. It's definitely a security item that's worth getting. I think just the sight of it will deter any casual thief.
customer_reviews.author: topamp

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it get wet and dirty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock, except that we had it under the trailer once and it rained, so it got wet and dirty. Now the lock seems like it's stuck and not coming up enough to allow the arms to slide open to size needed. It's stuck shut. No recourse I guess but to buy another. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cob

customer_reviews.title: Stored outside for over a year, looks new!
customer_reviews.text: Seems secure, I have had this on my camper in my yard for over a year, and it looks brand new! It won;t always work as a wheel chock as advertised through, depending on your style of wheel (it may be higher then ground level).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Buy a full boot!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK I forgot to take it off on day and it went around the tire and split it half and i drive off without even noticing
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fits the 15 inch wheels on my trailer well. The tire chock is nice. Not the most heavy duty, but a good deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Warren

customer_reviews.title: It fits.
customer_reviews.text: It fits and locks, I can see how thieves could get past it or remove it. But, I think it's more of a deterrent. You can definitely see it on the trailer so they might just pass it by and go to the next one.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Braun

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: While a dedicated thief can defeat any security system, this is a good deterrent. Plus it acts a built in wheel chock to keep your trailer from rolling around. Just don't forget to take it off before leaving!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harte R.

customer_reviews.title: Works as an extra deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Placed it on our travel trailer, it fit great and seems to be doing the job. Other reviews complained about the lock cover, but that seems to be ok, or maybe redesigned. Ours came with a nice cover for the lock. Overall it's an added deterrent, with the addition of our hick lock and lug locks. You might consider picking up a lug nut lock as well, since one could pull the tire to get the lock off. But just deflating the tire wouldn't get this thing off, you would need a new tire, but hey not all crooks are stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to lock when it arrived.  Now it doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace it after just a couple months. It would not lock/unlock. Too bad I like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Klug

customer_reviews.title: I like the robust color to alert would be criminals
customer_reviews.text: I like the robust color to alert would be criminals. It is well made out of steel. The claw helps to grab and serve as a cholk even on our RV pad. This is a great item to use for boaters, farmers, RV owners, etc.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you desire additional security for your vehicle, boat or camper. Securely clamps onto a wheel to deter potential thieves from moving your property. Good quality, tamper resistant locks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James Moseman

customer_reviews.title: As described. Good value
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery. Works as advertised. Easy to use. I am quite happy with the product and value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: time2trek

customer_reviews.title: The lock broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lock but have to give it a 2 star rating. The lock broke after 15 months of use. Had to torch it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ross D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The trailer hasn't been stolen yet.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the trailer hasn't been stolen yet. This is a simple security boot, but I think that just having it on the trailer is a deterrent to would-be thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Not A Bad Lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock is excellent. Only bad thing is moisture gathered in the key hole due to the climate changes from day to day and during a cold morning the lock was frozen. Other than that gives a good piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better at night
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toyota Camry and know that it is one of the top cars targetted for autotheft. I already installed a kill switch but realize many thieves bypass the security measures by hooking up the car to a tow wagon and carting it off. My big concern is when I park my car overnight the car will be stolen while no one can see them for several hours. I realize a determined car thief will eventually defeat all security measures but this inexpensive solution will help deter them and help me sleep better at nights.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: The Trimax Wheel Chock works well and seems to be built to last. I frequently travel to Baja and this along with a pin lock for the trailer coupler gives me peace of mind when I have to leave the trailer detached from my truck.
customer_reviews.author: D7

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to make sure our work trailer didn’t run off on us and it works super well. Great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this wheel lock for a cargo trailer. Fits perfectly on a 15" wheel. Don't really care about the "chock" feature since we use regular chocks. The key shape must have been designed by someone with a sense of humor; they're shaped like a pistol. Wish the hole in the key was slightly larger to fit better on a keyring but that's a minor complaint. The cover for the lock cylinder would work better if it was made out of rubber instead of hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Enerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for securing our T@G teardrop!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep our T@G teardrop secure. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lindamay

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I moved down south and had rented a UHAUL trailer and had to stay overnight in a hotel. I was nervous to leave it in the parking lot overnight and this made me feel so much better that someone couldn’t just put the trailer on their car and drive away. It was really easy to install on the wheel of the trailer and gave me piece of mind. I am so thankful this exists!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Slow down the thieves.
customer_reviews.text: Used two on each wheel of my trailer in conjunction with a donut lock on the hitch. Just trying to slow down the thieves. I could probably be remove with the cordless grinder in about five minutes. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Meaty

customer_reviews.title: solid and well made; great deterrent
customer_reviews.text: very well made, good price, and I like that it also acts as a chock; there is a plastic cover that protects the lock cylinder, a small but good feature. As mentioned by others, be sure to also buy a lug nut lock, or a determined thief can just take off the wheel and replace it. I also purchased a hitch lock that fits up inside of the hitch - nothing is fail safe, of course, all you can do is make it as hard as possible for a thief to steal your stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Renie

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this thing
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this thing. At least, it looks good on the wheel of my camper and I hope it deters people from stealing my camper. My camper is light weight 6x8. It also serve as a wheell chuck.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyPig

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the durability. Great safety device. I was worried because my last trailer was stolen. I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for sure, this thing is easy to use, comes on/off pretty quick too. I have to leave my nice jet ski trailer in an unattended parking lot all day, this offers some piece of mind. I would say this will fit most all boat trailer wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Saved one trailer. Have three of these. So far weather and theft have not been an issue. They fade but hold strong.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonOgre

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design yet a bit of a pain to use if u have any back problems
customer_reviews.text: So I lost the keys to this lock one day and asked a friend of mine who used to boost things back in his past to help me get through it and it withstood his many attempts at removal. That right there made me feel a lot more at ease.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good including the lock
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good including the lock, however I also had an issue of not getting it tie-up together, meaning the edges are not touching together to lock the wheel (rim) properly, it always have about 2 inch gap, which is not 100% accurate. Not sure whether it is a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty deterrent I use on my travel trailer. Nice cap covers the key insert.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Reardon

customer_reviews.title: I know this works, because I tried to drive ...
customer_reviews.text: I know this works, because I tried to drive off with it attached, forgetting it was on. The only way to remove this thing is to take the wheel off and then you have to have a replacement. The hassle of doing that lessens the threat of theft right there. I use this on a parked 4-wheeler that I leave on my property all year.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It's at least a great theft deterrent that'll slow a thief down.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Dont loose the 2 keys!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to get on and off. Seems sturdy. I cant comment on effectiveness as it will take an attempt to steal our golf cart until I know.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Tried a couple of these and they work well. I’m ordering more for my other trailers
customer_reviews.author: William Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Lil boot
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but seems very strong and will be a great on my scooter.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: It is a good investment for securing your trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Sat locked under brackish water for the duration of Harvey and for several more months. Unlocked it without problems and it had no signs of rust or corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Xxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had anyone try to steal my trailer yet so it must be doing the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! I've had this on since day one and nobody has attempted to mess with our trailer. We are in the process of converting a cargo trailer to a camper and this along with a coupler lock have done the trick. Fits our 15" trailer tires perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is solid and a good value for the money. We feel more secure knowing our 10' trailer can't be hooked up and towed away by a stranger. So far it's working - the trailer is still there!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I don't worry about it being stolen anymore
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Anti theft - anywhere, anytime!
customer_reviews.text: Great deterrent- I wish it came with 1 or 2 locking lugs - for one stop shopping!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly hawke

customer_reviews.title: This product works well with my enclosed trailer. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works well with my enclosed trailer. I use it when I have to unhook my trailer when I am out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Austin White

customer_reviews.title: Good chock, good security.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and good quality lock. The only issue I have is that the plastic material for the lock cover for the lock is a bit brittle. It cracked and is not attached to the chock anymore, but the cap that covers the lock is fine. Users must be aware that the chock lock should be used in conjunction with wheel locks. The chock lock can be quickly defeated by simply removing the wheel that it is secured to.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, stands out
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deterrent for the neighborhood car thieves after my van was stolen last year. No worries at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the bold colors make sure that most folks don't even fool with it. Easy to install and to remove with the keys also. Have been using it by the coast, and shows no sign of rust for almost two years now. Happy with the product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deon Potgieter

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works well to lock down my trailer. Easy to remove and install.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jones

customer_reviews.title: well made, simple, high visibility, i swear ...
customer_reviews.text: well made, simple, high visibility, i swear by these. Ive had trailers stolen by people with just rope! This solves that problem
customer_reviews.author: JACK W.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel lock will not unlock with keys that came with them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these. Locked 2 trailers and went back to unlock them and keys provided will not unlock them. Now I have to pay a welder to come out and cut them off possibly burning a tire in the process. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: msgerry44

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing better than having piece of mind rather than coming home ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than having piece of mind rather than coming home & finding your Boat gone. Awesome product, well constructed, solid steel, fits perfectly, yet works well. Extremely noticeable & does deter theft. Greta job, well done. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY HAMBOYAN

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made, but not particularly heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made, but not particularly heavy duty, or large. My wheel well is big enough so that a determined thief could probably drive off with the unit if they did not have to drive too far, say to drag the small travel trailer up on a flatbed truck. But it should be a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: H. T.

customer_reviews.title: Decent build, good additional lock.
customer_reviews.text: Good build, a good addition as a supplementary tire lock. Would not rely on it as the only lock.
customer_reviews.author: EdilR

customer_reviews.title: Solid build installs in seconds.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how solid this is built and how easy it is to install, takes seconds. Would definitely recommend this wheel lock.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Not for the 1%
customer_reviews.text: It sits there dissuading the 99.9% of thieves in our urban neighborhood ("aspirational" and rare thankfully). I am sure someone who is intentionally seeking out camper/trailers to steal can take off with it - but then that is what insurance or $95/month storage facilities are for.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, even in the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up just like it was described in the information
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: it's well make & a great deterrent for the un-welcomed!
customer_reviews.author: R.R

customer_reviews.title: solid!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Works like a champ! Had my last camper stolen, never again with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this device.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an extra piece of security that gives you quick access or remove.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Samples

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my travel trailer and it's very sturdy and a good visual deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: justathought

customer_reviews.title: This is my second TCL65. I got one last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second TCL65. I got one last year to help secure my motorcycle camping trailer when it was disconnected from the motorcycle. I am going to use this one to help secure my trike. These are well made, and a strong deterrent to theft.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy JR

customer_reviews.title: Great theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as described. I give it give 5 stars. The only thing I've noticed after having it outside for a couple months is that it's faded a little. Not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Thieves like it easy
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my pop up 13 inch tires. Key is a pain in the ass until you practice. If you have two of them, the sight alone is hopefully enough to keep on moving. Thieves like it easy.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: For smaller wheels. Did not fit a dump trailer.
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit my dump trailer wheels. It will go on kind of but if you drive on it it would slip right off.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: My portable saw mill has some very small tires on it. This lock is too big. Someone could tie this lock up to the frame and drive off easily. I will modify this lock to include a bar across the two red pieces to improve it's function.
customer_reviews.author: John L Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller wheels like my golf cart Solid construction Easy to use Does ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Fits smaller wheels like my golf cart Solid construction Easy to use Does not cover lug nuts so vehicle can be stolen if thief brings spare wheel. I use locking lug nuts on that wheel as an xtra barrier
customer_reviews.author: SJ S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel lock is super simple to use and the quality is really good. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Doolittle

product_meta.title: Trimax TCL65 Wheel Chock Lock
product_meta.description: Size:7.25inTRIMAX WHEEL CHOCK LOCK quickly and easily attaches to any wheel eliminating the ability to tow or drive away. Universal design fits any wheel. Unique design chocks the wheel while installed to keep from rolling. Dishwasher safe
feature_bullets: Quick and easy installation for unattended trailers, cars, boats, ATVs and more.
Built in chock prevents trailer rollaway
High strength pick resistant locking mechanism, comes with 2 keys
Made of heavy gauge rugged powder coated steel
Rubber coated arms protect wheel finish
Quickly and easily attaches to any wheel eliminating the ability to tow or drive away
Unique design chocks the wheel while installed to keep from rolling
Durable powdercoat finish ensures years of corrosion free use.
Like all Trimax Products it is covered by a Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Cover Included: Trimax Deluxe Universal Wheel Chock Lock Dual Action Design-Chocks & Locks The Wheel TCL65, Blister Packaging
